content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were looking over lake michigan, and we both saw amber-colored orbs making an arc across the sky, seven in total.  it was completely quiet that night. i did see and hear a jet elsewhere in the sky, flying at 30,000 feet. these were orange objects about 8 times brighter than venus in the night sky. they started south of us on the horizon, and they came fast. then they would start and stop a few times then head off west, fading away. at some times, one was heading west while another one was starting off at the south--so they were not a single object. the whole process from south to west took about 5 minutes. two separate times, a light dropped from the object and tapered off like a firework.  we got binoculars out to look, but as clear as we made the binoculars, we couldn't make out any clear detail.
content.summary: Orbs over lake michigan, from south to even with us, fast and stopping, then off to the west.

content.detailedDescription:
I was smoking a cigarette on my porch and i was obviously looking up at the stars. i noticed that it looked like a star was moving. it looked just like a bright star was moving in a straight line. this was august 24th of 2013 at about 9pm. i was watching the star like ufo move for less then 5 minutes and then i noticed that the light got dimmer and soon vanished. i didn't see any blinking lights like a normal plane makes. it looked like it was high up in the air, i thought it was a star at first and it looked just like a star that was moving. 

i only watched it for less then 5 minutes but i don't know what it was so i'm calling it a ufo. the light was a constant whitish light that looked like it was moving in a straight path and then the light got dimmer until it disappeared. 

thanks!
content.summary: It looked like a star that was moving. the light went out after a few minutes.

content.detailedDescription: Driving north on interstate 87 in nys. 3 aircraft flying south parallel to interstate 87 low in the sky at 9:25 pm on a clear cool evening.  i slowed to watch the 3 aircraft which were not normal aircraft as their lights seemed to pulsate and flicker randomly orange. i was close enough to see the shape.  there were no wings or rotors and they made no noise.  they looked like flying "jacks" in the sky. they were not moving quickly and they maintained a due south course.  as i could not turn around on the highway i lost sight of them as they moved further south.
content.summary: 3 objects 3d star shaped flying slow and low in formation

content.detailedDescription: My partner and i travelled to massey ontario, canada were we were scouting film locations for a current project. on august 22nd, 2013, we were camping at my partner's mom's cabins by toulouse bay on the sagamok first nation. at 11:30 pm we were enjoying a fire and discussing the day's activities. when i looked up, i commented on how you can see the stars so clearly when your out of the city. it was then i saw a bright light moving at a high rate of speed. i quickly grabbed my sony hdr-hc3 camera which had a wide angle lens on it already and began to film this object. i filmed for approximately 2 minutes and do not know what this object is. after showing the footage to various members of the community, there have been other reports of strange objects in the sky. what is this that we filmed?
content.summary: Bright object travelling very fast

content.detailedDescription: Ross township, pa (northern suburbs of pittsburgh) - about 9:30 pm on saturday, august 24, i took my 3-year-old son outside into the backyard to talk with a good friend who was having a smoke, after most of the guests for my son���s birthday party earlier had left for the evening. it was a starlight night with some puffy large clouds scattered about. soon as i stepped into my yard, out of the corner of my eye, i caught two bright objects in the eastern sky. i looked up and saw two glowing orange orbs that appeared to be about the height of low commercial airplanes. i initially thought they might be satellites or bright planets. however, they were too bright and two low and were moving across the sky to the west, much like propelled aircraft. the more my friend and i studied them the more we couldn't figure out what they were. we actually laughed that maybe we were witnessing ufos. we thought the objects might be small airplanes but there was no sound or blinking lights. they seemed to be moving far too fast to be hot air balloons. they traveled too smoothly and quickly to be helicopters. we were really mystified as we couldn't conventionally describe what we were looking at. when this pair of orange glowing balls made their way to the west, originating in a straight line formation behind them - came 5 more. my friend counted a total of 7. i thought one of the last ones seemed to veer toward us ever briefly. however, they all seemed to follow along one after the other on the same trajectory across the sky. staring at one of them, i thought there was a certain dynamic flickering light in the center of the orb, almost like a steady upright flame. however, it seemed different than a normal fire, yet similar in an odd way. at this point, i was mesmerized by how serene they appeared, and also awestruck. when i initially saw the 5 additional objects that followed the original 2, i was momentarily nervous about what we were looking at. however, as i continued to study them as they arced across the sky from east to west, they seemed harmless and serene. the objects appeared to move slowly, but after they left completely, i gather they must have been traveling at a faster velocity than a commercial airplane to cover the sky in such a short amount of time. watching them leave, i was filled with wonder and fascination. my friend and i agreed we couldn't conventionally explain what we had just seen and that we had never seen anything like this in the night sky before. the objects disappeared one after the other into the western sky.
content.summary: 7 orange balls of energy arcing across sky one after the other in pittsburgh, pa northern suburbs

content.detailedDescription: On august 20, 2013, my partner and i had travelled to sagamok first nation territory to scout out some film locations for a current project. during the evening of august 22nd, 2013, we camped at toulouse bay at my partner's mom's cabins which are located on the shores of the toulouse bay. approximately at 11:30 pm that evening, we were both sitting enjoying a campfire and discussing the days activities. when i looked up into the clear night sky, i made the comment on how beautiful it is to get out of the city and how bright the stars are. there before both of us was a bright penny sized white glowing object that was moving at a faster rate than most aircraft that i have seen. it was directly above us moving from the west to the east. the object did not make any sound whatsoever. it was totally silent as it passed over us. i first thought it was probably just a satellite but the object was to large to be that. i rushed and started my sony hdr-hc3 camera. i managed to capture 2 minutes of footage of this object flying away from us. the trees are visiable in the last part of the footage which gives you a perspective of how fast and the size of the object was when compared with the stationary trees. the object just faded out of sight as it moved away from us. i have never experienced anything like this before which was not explainable. after showing the footage taken to various members of the community of sagamok first nation, many stories of similar experiences started to emerge.
content.summary: Unknown bright light in sky seen and recorded

content.detailedDescription: Was uploading shots of jamestown r.I. and noticed small object in mid lt sky
content.summary: Roun object not seen at time of photo

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were walking back from the park accross the street from our home with our son. we ran into our neighbor on our way home and our neighbor notice the first light than a second, i than turned and saw the lights and than aonther and another for the total of four light in the formation of a diamond. i went to my house a got my video camara and started to record. than one light disappeared and the formation was in the shape of a triangle. i did record a lot of video for a single sighting.
content.summary: Recorded

content.detailedDescription:
1. where were you and what were you doing at the time? walking outside to my car.
2. what made you first notice the object? i noticed an odd flashing/blinking light nearly 80-90degrees above me. 
3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it? i thought it might be a kite. but i realized it was spiraling too exactly and the area between the spiral seemed solid
4. describe the object and its actions and motions in detail. there was this weird spiraling light. the object had one falshing color changing light in a circle with this weird shadowy trail behind it. at first it thought it was some kind of kite but then i realized the area in between the circle seemed solid. the light stopped spinning and seemed to hover for a second them slowly flew off to the ne. through out the event i was seemingly the first to notice but was joined by a family of 4-5 people who also noticed that object shortly before it flew off.

5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object. - confusion and surprise

6. how did you lose sight of the object? it went over the trees. i tried to pursue in my car but lost track of it immediately.
content.summary: Spiraling lights over the trees

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were returning from the park with our son, we were walking. we ran into our neighbor and our neighbor first noticed one light and than another at that piont i turned to see the lights, at this piont another apeared than another for a total of four lights in a straight line. the first light stopped than so on. the lights all stopped in a formation of a diamond than one disappeared and the formation was that of a triangle. this was all cuaght on video. august 25, 2013 8:30pm. berlin, nh.
content.summary: Recording came out well.

content.detailedDescription: We live at an apartment en i was outside enjoying the cloud shapes. on my right a very bright light appeared, pulsating and moving fast away. with the naked eye only the very bright light was visible en the field arround it seemed effected like clouds moving away. i was sure it was no airplane or drone, i know how they move and what they look like, we see those often here too. my camera was just around the door, since it is there standby for the cloud pictures i often make. before i had my camera and came back, in about 10 seconds it was nearly out of sight already, but i tried to photographe it anyway. later on i enlarged and could see this object with the light.
content.summary: Bright pulsating light moving fast from center towards west-coast (netherlands)

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting at campground friends walked back to their camper and called us to look up towards the east skyline.  waves of traveling lights unlike planes were moving in formation at a constant speed  heading west.   there were at times clusters of these lights traveling together.  the just keep coming from the east.   (if you look at a youtube video  called freaky lights huntersville nc they seemed to capture on video what we saw however at a different date)

one light object glowed more brilliantly than the three it was clustered with and then glowed so intensely it started to "melt" like lava and the part that poured down created a secondary light that descended towards earth .  it was the only one that i saw do that.

what were these lights.  i called 911 and then channel fox news tv.
looking for an answer. did anyone else see this besides the four of us?
content.summary: Wave of orange lights in groups traveling in sky approx over 100 over an hour

content.detailedDescription: Around 10:45 aug.25th, traveling southbound just past route 9 on 115, i noticed a bright light. it looked like the light on top of a phone tower. before i could say whats that light, it passed by us at a super rate of speed.  windows down radio down and we didnt hear a thing. and we were deffinately close enough that we shouldve heard s omething. it was super bright. after it passed i turned to look but saw nothing. very scary to me because i cant explain what we saw. we then rolled the windows up and sped up!
content.summary: Super bright light moving high speed opposite direction i was travelling very close

content.detailedDescription: Saw a round light in the sky while driving on the 23 freeway going south. it was sighted over the santa monica mountain range in newbury park, ca. at first thought to be an airplane. then the ball changed from purple to red to bright white. it fell then raised, then fell again at an angle. then disappeared.
content.summary: A ball of light moving erratically

content.detailedDescription: Well myself and about 6 friends were sittin around a fire and havin a few drinks on a beautiful summer night and we noticed a glow in the distance that was red/orange. we all observed it and it was moving down towards the earth then disaperred. i mentioned to my friend he shoulda had his camera or binoculars that he has in his vehicle. ( last year at this same moment he was driving on the highway jus above the valley at about 945pm n it was really foggy. he turned his head and noticed something massive a blink shaped object with pulsating grid of red lights. he said it was very big like 3-4 houses long and was hovering near the ground and was about 100-200 meters from him. he turned his head to watch the road then looked back n it was gone. it was a very weird fog that night n almost perfect night for somethin like that to stealth. he noticeda part of the object was blacked out. see he told me all this after he approached me at my hoise 10min after he seen this he is a big guy and its hard to scare him n he was terrified looked like he was gonna have a heart attack. we drove back up there together to see if we can find anything but all there was was fog. unfortunetly he didnt have cell phone or camera with him that night. .... but lets get back to the other night this year ok so after it vanished i went n got binoculars n hey in about 15-20 min after the firstsightin it showed up again!! this time headin up towards the sky slowly hovering n pulsing red n orange ...I used the binoculars n it was far but man was the object big length wise!!! it was not a star not a satelite not a plane not a helicopter ,, it was some kind of aircraft n i believe it was ufo. there has been lots of stories around this area and its a hot spot.
content.summary: Glowing object in sky

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were on the back porch. i just showed her venus in the sw sky. then something caught the corner of my eye. it was high in the eastern sky. it was the same size as venus and brighter. 

no sound came from it and it kept going in a easterly direction for about 3 minutes. we looked through it with hi powered binocular's. it was not a plane. 

i ran out to the front yard to get a unobstructed view. then it disappeared like someone turning off a light switch. last point of view was still high in the eastern sky.
content.summary: Looked like a star moving

content.detailedDescription:
Two of us were looking for our cat outside when bright orange lights started coming across the night sky in 1s, 2s, and 3s, only a few moments from eachother. one individual ran inside to grab the third person and we viewed these incredibly bright firey orange lights and counted anywhere from 30-40 of them flying accross the sky. at the end of the occurances at least a burst of 15-17 appeared in a random group and continued along the same path as the others. they were silent.
we have video, pictures, and other witnesses.
content.summary: 30-40 bright orange lights in scattered path going ssw from nne

content.detailedDescription:
Returning home after leaving my job, around 1230 a.M., i noticed a very bright odd shaped light in the sky some distance from me.  i thought it was a plane at first, but then realized the large luminous lighting was going away from me instead of toward me...The light was very bright, bluish white...And a tint of red around the edges. it was higher in the sky at one point and seemed closest to me at that point. i lost sight  of it as i drove and was afraid when i came to a stop sign on the top of the hill, i'd not be able to see it. but there it was lower and was going more north east than the original direction i noticed when i first saw it. the intensity of the lighting never varied...It glowed around the edges. i had my cell phone but i couldn't get a picture of it from where i was. when i went southeast toward my house maybe 150 yards, it was on my  left going northeast....I stopped my car and took the photo. you can see the line of trees and the sky was clear that evening..So there were few clouds.  when i looked at the photo, it definitely had a triangular, boomerang shape. my headlights can be seen throwing some light out around the front of the car which had nothing to do with the object in the air.  it was strange to be alone in the middle of the night, nobody on the road but me and seeing this. but i was glad i had a camera of sorts to verify what i saw. from where i was and where the object was....It was bigger than i thought when i first saw it.  
the object simply moved quickly over the tree line and disappeared like some one had flipped a switch. there was no noise, and no planes in the area.  i thought this was rather curious as i see a lot of approaching jets going into the charlotte area airport...But i didn't see or heard any of them.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Large luminous light looked like a large cake, glowed, changed attitude, speed and direction.

content.detailedDescription:
Tonight around 9 pm... sitting on porch, looking at venus...I saw two bright objects one going north and one going south ...Passing under venus..The one going north disappeared right away...The one going south was slowly cruising by...I was fascinated as it was so huge and bright...Then it continued south and stopped...Thats when i yelled for my 39 yr old son to come see the ufo..He joined me on porch...We both watched it continue cruising now southeast..It crossed most of the night sky and stopped right over our house...I started waving at it...I know silly ..But i get so excited..It brightened seem to grow some larger...Then it faded and disappeared...It wasnt directly over our house...But by standing in the yard i could see it over the roof...

when i first saw the one going north i thought it might be a airplane but it didnt blink...Was just solid ...The one going south was so big, i knew right away it was a ufo...

after the sighting i texted my two daughter to tell them all about it...

it grew a little brighter then faded away slowly...We kept looking hoping it would reappear...But it didnt ...

it was bigger than venus from our view...About half bigger...
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It was huge, white and bright...Cruised under venus going south,stopped, cruised se then stopped faded disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Was sitting on my porch which faces east. was looking at the rain clouds coming in. i noticed a group of white objects moving from east to west. at first i wondered if it might be a group of white birds avoiding the storm but they traveled behind a low storm cloud and i could see them glowing through the cloud. there were about 15-20 white glowing orbs traveling together and holding altitude. i tried to get my camera out to video the objects but before i could they had traveled to far west and i could no longer see them because our building was now blocking my view. so i ran inside and straight through my apt. while yelling at my son ethan to follow. as we approached a good observation area on the south side of the bldg i was telling my son the height and flight path of the objects when he spotted them at about 2 miles out as they came out from behind a cloud. he saw the same group of what he describes as "a dozen to a dozen and a half white orbs" traveling west away from us. the objects were then lost in the cloud cover. these were definitely glowing objects that were not " usual" or " normal". my son also noticed slight changes is elevation of a few of the orbs as they traveled.
content.summary: Saw a group of lights to the south just before a rain storm

content.detailedDescription: Was able to view object in the last few minutes prior to sunset against a cloudy sky.  undefined blimp like shape that stood out starkly against a darkening sky.  no lights or sound.  object remained visible until the sky darkened at about 8:25 p.M.  trained meteorologist here and this left goosebumps.  too dark for photography.
content.summary: Dark blob hovering at dusk

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my backyard enjoying my last day of summer when my buddy pointed out a orb really low in the sky the orb was moving extremely fast with one solid light heading southeast and then fading out miles ahead . i have been investigating for about 4 years now but never witnessed one in person and i must say it defiantly makes you feel strange.
content.summary: Absolutely crazy

content.detailedDescription: My family was at a cub scout family night here in indianapolis watching a projected movie outside. there were several dozen families and approximately 100 total people, although i couldn't say just how many people observed it. we frequently see very strange crafts and lights in our area, but this is the first that i have reported. we were laying on a blanket on the ground, looking at the stars which is a regular activity, especially for my wife and i. there was one star-like object, very much brighter than anything else in the sky which appeared to come closer for a period of time before changing directions and moving farther away. it continued on a relatively straight heading becoming a little smaller in size, then appeared to stop, then start again. then suddenly moved faster, and just vanished. one minute it was there, then just gone. we were all in amazement at what we were seeing, the whole family witnessing one of these at the same time was a first. as i said, we have seen dozens of objects, unexplained lights, strange moving lights, and such things over the years we have lived in this area. this was a unique sighting, unlike any of the previous ones, and the fact that the object simply vanished was amazing.There were several other strange lights in the area during the night, after this one, none quite as wonderful. i will continue to watch the skies, each opportunity i get. i have known my whole life that we are not the only beings in the vastness of space, and i hope sometime in my lifetime it will be undeniable and proven.
content.summary: Brilliant, star-like object. very bright, moving slowly then slowly smaller till disappearing

content.detailedDescription: Although we had only observed one orb/sphere...Chinese lantern my behind. i was in blissfield mi on 8/17/13 and it was after 10pm...I was outside smoking sitting on my man's front porch i noticed a light i thought it was an airplane, then it changed colors from white to pink around the outside to bright red, i called out to my boyfriend he came outside. i told him it went behind that tree we both ran out in middle of his front yard facing east then low and behold there it was...Hovering in the sky.. it then changed colors just like it had done minuets before. wow it then made an abrupt decent. we both know what we saw on the 17th. when i read tonight's paper, all i got to say is chinese lanterns my ass! i still have goose bumps and i know what i saw i too am too darn old to tell stories.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Wow my boyfriend and i thought we were the only ones to see what occured in monroe mi last sat night...

content.detailedDescription: Husband and i, cedar hill, tx.,  in back yard and noticed a large silver cigar shaped object in sky.  no wings and no sound.  it came to a complete stop then contined flying southwest towards mansfield, tx.
content.summary: Silver cigar shape object was flying - stopped for about 2 secs then continued.

content.detailedDescription: On the morning of october 31, 2011 i had gone outside to let my dog outside to use do his business. the time would be between 5:30am and 6am. while i was outside with him i tend to look up at the stars. i love the stars so when they are visible i look at them. as i was looking i noticed what appeared to be two boomerang shapes as one object. it had small lights on it to resemble stars but the object was solid. to me it resembled a consultation. it was about the size of a somewhat low flying commercial airplane, it travelled from north to south.  it didn't make a sound, it was very quite outside. i live off of i635 and i35.
content.summary: Moved from north to south. looked like two boomerangs similar to a consultation.

content.detailedDescription: At the street, looking stars. fast moving. satelite. see up.
content.summary: First we tought it's a satellit but it changed it's location like teleporting. then it went away and disappered.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i just finished working on our land and was sitting on our houseboat in front yard resting . i noticed a star like object colored orangish/ gold just above tree tops heading east then it kind of bounced or pulshed back and forth slightly, went trough a cloud , then it looked like it changed direction slightly and with exceeding speed left. my husband came inside and stared research online. i stayed out until 1am with our telescope hoping to see it again while waiting to see the asteroid . i believe that object is nothing from our world , i think it may be from the heavenly realms.
content.summary: Star like object had a steady flight heading east then it pulsed like, went thought the cloud and turned to leave with exceeding speed.

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking the dog for a morning walk as i often do. we were on our way back home, about one block from my house. the sky was cloudy and overcast to the south and southeast, with the sun being behind the clouds.
i am always observing my surroundings (including the sky) and just happened to catch sight if this object.
upon spotting it, i thought right away it was a ufo as it was not operating in the normal fashion of a plane or helicopter, nor did it resemble either of those.
when i first saw it, it was hovering motionless in one spot in the sky. then it slowly started to ascend in a straight pattern and go towards the southeast further from my location. it did not have any obvious lights and there was no sound. the flight was very smooth, no directional changes at all. it was difficult to make out any colour due to the sun being behind it among the clouds and causing it to look dark. there was no reflection from the sun.  
i felt surprised and excited. i stood there for a few minutes observing it and noticed another person doing the same - we did not speak. my dog did not have any reaction to it or behave unusually. i hurried home and told my wife to hurry outside of the house and we looked to the southeast but the object had already left at that time and she did not get to see it.
i absolutely believe it was not a weather balloon or a kite as it travelled against the wind in a straight pattern.
content.summary: Out walking and saw a dark diamond shaped object far away, below cloud cover accelerating and rising. glare from the sun made it difficult to see.

content.detailedDescription: I went to look out the window of my house near toronto. i was just about to go to bed; it was really late, about 3 or so in the morning. i don't often look at stars at night (don't get a good view here and i prefer sunsets) but i like to look up at them sometimes, and make a wish. at first i only saw a couple starts, and i put on my glasses to see if they were really stars or not, and found a lot more. one of the stars, though, as i looked closer, had little red, green, and such lights surrounding this one star, circling and shooting around this one star as it moved very slowly from east to west. the lights didn't just slowly circle this star, they were rapidly shooting in various circles, back and forth, fading and brightening again, in every direction yet staying close to this star. i started to think this wasn't a star, maybe a comet or such, and being the superstitious person, i made a wish on it. but then i thought maybe it wasn't a comet. maybe it was still stars, just moving rapidly in such galaxy far away. i started to think maybe i was just tired, and my eyes were seeing things, but i tested looking at other stars to see if they had strange lights circling them too, but they didn't. i even tested looking at the strange group of lights with one eye, then the other, and the lights were still moving around that one star-like moving light. i kept staring for a while longer, but i had to go to bed. i decided i would google "several different-coloured starlights surrounding circling & shooting around 1 moving starlight" in the morning, so i wrote it on my hand and went to sleep. i woke up with pen marks on my face (of course) and went to show my mom. she asked what i wrote on my hand and when i started telling her about looking at the stars my sister made a joke about me seeing a ufo with aliens and they're coming for us. i then said i actually saw all these lights circling around this star and my mom was the one that said maybe my sister is right, and that i should search up ufo sightings. my little sighting seems so small compared to a lot of the sightings i've read about but i thought maybe as small as it is i could still get some answers.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: At first looked like a star, but the little colourful lights shooting and circling around the moving light told me otherwise.
